snippet.title: Wrath of the Black Manta (Taito, 1990) - NES Gameplay
snippet.description:
In the game the player goes through five levels, using throwing stars and special abilities called the "Ninja Arts", to stop a gang and the evil mastermind behind a slue of kidnappings, El Toro. One of the kidnapped is a student of the Black Manta's sensei, Taro. The Black Manta has many powers, which he gets after beating a level. The player can choose which power to use by pressing start. These powers can help the Black Manta defeat enemies and bosses more quickly. Part of last level is seen through a first person perspective. The Black Manta also has to defeat one of the bosses from the previous levels.

Known on Famicom as: Ninja Cop Saizou


NESGUIDE ARCHIVE INFO

The original NES gameplay archive, est 2007 includes gameplay captures from all commercial releases from the US market with a few extras (like famicom releases) just for fun. As of Dec 2024, I've resumed efforts to update some of the older (some 360p) videos with higher-def captures. Text updates will be posted to BlueSky (which doesn't require an account to view). Please follow there (or just bookmark the url) if you're interested!

https://bsky.app/profile/nesguide.com
